availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew R. Boon (Mayfield, Graves County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Mayfield, Kentucky, attorney. Davidson County, Tennessee, native. Married to Sallie Ann Dallam Boon in Graves County, Kentucky, on January 7, 1852. Father of Mary B. Boon and Martha A. Boon. Attorney in Graves County in 1860. Judge of Graves County Court in May 1861. Member from Graves County of the convention of the provisional government held at Russelville, Kentucky, in November 1861. Attorney in the Hickman County Court in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, Mayfield, p. 331.
